feedinfo.name: PCI_DSS_FIM
feedinfo.summary: This feed is a collection of critical Windows files that should be monitored for modification under PCI DSS requirement 11.5.  Please note that this feed is not provided by Carbon Black, and is simply a starting point for monitoring Windows file modifications per the PCI DSS spec.  Please consult with your QSA for potential exclusions or additions.
feedinfo.category: PCI DSS Internal Test - Rob Eberhardt
